Deepika Padukone Biography | Wiki | Height | Age | Husband | Family

Bolly Reporter
10 months ago

Deepika Padukone is an Indian Bollywood film actress and one of the highest-paid actresses in India. She is acknowledged with several awards and rewards for her great work in Indian cinema, along with 3 Filmfare awards. She is one of the most famous celebrities in India. Her name is among the list of 100 most influential people in the world in 2018 published by the world’s most pronounced Time Magazine.

Biography & Wiki

Deepika Padukone’s nickname is Deepi and Deepz. She was born on 5 January 1986 Copenhagen, Denmark and brought up in Bangalore, India. Hence, her current age is 34 years. Deepika’s Zodiac is Capricorn. She is from a Chitrapur Saraswat Brahmin family.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Deepika’s height in feet is 5′ 8½”. Also, her height in Centimeters is 174 cm.

Family Members

Deepika Padukone’s father, Prakash Padukone, is a former badminton player of international repute. Prakash Padukone wins the 1981 Badminton World Cup in singles. Deepika’s mother, Ujjala Padukone is a travel agent. Her Younger sister is Anisha Padukone who is also a Golfer. Her family is residing in Bangalore, where Deepika lives and works in Mumbai, India.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Deepika Padukone had a relationship with Nihaar Pandya before introduce it to the film industry. It was rumored that Deepika dated with actor Upen Patel and actor Muzammil Ibrahim. Also, there was a buzz that she had an affair with Cricketer Yuvraj Singh.

Deepika Padukone was in a serious relationship with actor Ranbir Kapoor. They fell in love in the set of Bachna Ae Haseeno in 2008. They were allegedly madly in love before they sadly broke up. After that Deepika dated Siddharth Mallya.

On 14-15 November 2018, Deepika married actor Ranveer Singh in a Lake Como, Lombardy, Italy. They fell in love with a set of Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram Leela and after dating for six years they get married.

Education and School, College

Deepika Padukone had her primary education from Sophia High School, Bengaluru. After that, She joined Mount Carmel College, Bengaluru for graduation in Sociology. She is a college dropout.

Salary and Net Worth

Deepika has an estimated net worth of almost $20 Million. She earns almost Rs.14 crores as salary for every movie she plays. Her annual income is ₹112.8 crore.

Deepika is having some most high-end luxury cars. The Audi Q7 was also the first luxury vehicle owned by Deepika. Furthermore, Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone both purchased may costly vehicles together. They purchased Mercedes-Benz GLS. They also have Aston Martin Rapide S, Mercedes-Benz GLS, Land Rover Range Rover Vogue, Jaguar XJ L, Mercedes-Maybach S500, etc.

Deepika Padukone Filmography

In 2006, Deepika made her acting debut with the Kannada film “Aishwarya“, in which she played the lead role. Her first Bollywood release was “Om Shanti Om” in 2007 opposite Shah Rukh Khan and directed by Farah Khan. She also appeared in a Hollywood Movie xXx: Return of Xander Cage in 2017.

Deepika has acted Many commercial big hit movies like Om Shanti Om (2007), Love Aaj Kal (2009), Bachna Ae Haseeno (2008), Housefull (2010), Happy New Year (2014), Cocktial, Bajirao Mastani (2015), Piku (2015), Chennai Express (2013), Jeh Jawaani hai Deewani (2013), Padmavat (2018), etc. Furthermore, She has been the recipient of three Filmfare Awards: Best Female Debut for Om Shanti Om (2007), and two Best Actress awards for Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela (2013) and Piku (2015). Moreover, Deepika Padukone has been the recipient of three Filmfare Awards: Best Female Debut for Om Shanti Om (2007), and two Best Actress awards for Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela (2013) and Piku (2015).

Furthermore, She played the lead role in Padmaavat which is one of the most expensive Hindi films and earned a total ₹5.45 billion (US$79 million).

Awards & Recognition

  • Deepika won Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut in 2007 for Om Shanti Om.
  • Also, She has received four Filmfare Awards.
  • Furthermore, She won three IIFA awards.
  • Deepika won two Producers Guild Film Awards
  • She won nine Screen Awards.
  • Deepika won three Stardust Awards and six Zee Cine Awards

Facts about Deepika Padukone

  • Deepika has a tattoo on Neck of her ex-boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor’s initials.
  • Firstly, She has appeared in a highly popular print campaign for the 2006 Kingfisher Calendar.
  • Deepika made her first appearance on the ramp when she was 17 years old.
  • In addition to acting, Deepika has written opinion columns and has been involved with women’s health and fitness magazines.
  • She has also supported charitable organizations and has performed for stage shows.
  • Furthermore, in 2008, she was ranked one in Indian Maxim’s “Hot 100” list.
  • In 2015, she founded the “Live Love Laugh Foundation”, to prevent and deal with depression.
